mapper.select: SELECT r.ID, r.ROLE_NAME, r.ROLE_CODE, r.ROLE_DESC, r.ENABLED, r.CREATE_TIME, r.UPDATE_TIME, (SELECT USERNAME FROM user u WHERE u.ID = r.CREATE_USER) AS CREATE_USERNAME, (SELECT USERNAME FROM user u WHERE u.ID = r.UPDATE_USER) AS UPDATE_USERNAME FROM role r WHERE r.DELETED = 0 AND r.ID = #{roleId}
